title: Underwater Welding: Techniques, Challenges, and Advancements

comments.text: Interesting article on underwater welding – directly relevant to building and maintaining undersea habitats.  The challenges highlighted, especially with wet welding, are critical for any large-scale underwater construction project like an underwater city.  This points to a key materials science hurdle that needs innovative solutions.
